insights.populationGrowth: Moderate 1.4% with cultural tourism and Mekong agriculture.
insights.educationLevel: Good 78% literacy with UNESCO World Heritage site development.

insights.temperature: Tropical, hot dry season (26°C-37°C), warm wet monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Annual Mekong floods, droughts, UNESCO site weather risks.

recentDisasters.impact: Wat Phou temple complex threatened, tourism evacuated

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Medium - Tourism infrastructure but heritage protection challenges

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: UNESCO World Heritage tourism, Mekong agriculture, cultural preservation economy
